thread.title_full: Outstanding - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Alistair L
title: Outstanding
text:
I was really surprised and pleased at just how good this Hotel was. To start with I booked online at their website and was able to request where my room was in the hotel, type of view, type of pillows and if I wanted extra pillows (all at not cost) Everyone I encountered couldn't have been more helpful. When I order a glass of wine to my room it was delivered by the sommelier himself. The food both room service and breakfast was excellent and freshly cooked rather than canteen style. Did I also mention that the whole decor was modern and very stylish from the rooms to the lobby. All the services were ordered through a tablet next to the bed where you could just click and order, no more dirty 'info books' here. Outstanding
Room Tip: book through their hotel and you can chose the rooms See more room tips
